translations: n.吉普赛人；（非正式）流浪汉，心灵自由者（等于gypsy）

phrs.translation: 吉卜赛人, 吉普赛人

sentences.sentence: When we began the next kirtana transcendental chaos broke out as the gipsies began wildly chanting and dancing with us. The kirtana went on for hours!
sentences.translation: 当我们再次开始克伊尔坦时，超然的声响迸发而出，吉普赛人开始狂野的唱诵，和我们一起热烈地起舞，克伊尔坦持续了数小时！
